That's why, you're toxic as hell.

Hello Tucker,

As far as i know the 2200 permaban code is reserved for fraudulent use of the Refer-a-Friend program Issue or the use of '3rd Party Modifications'. 

I thought I should mention this section from Riot's Terms of Use:

" RIOT GAMES RESERVES THE RIGHT TO SUSPEND, TERMINATE, MODIFY OR DELETE YOUR ACCOUNT AT ANY TIME FOR ANY REASON OR NO REASON, WITH OR WITHOUT NOTICE TO YOU, AND WITH NO LIABILITY OF ANY KIND TO YOU." 

You're best bet is contacting Player Support (https://support.leagueoflegends.com/home) but permaban's are almost never overturned.

~ORION~
r.i.p everyone. going to nuke the world.

Sorry but "no reason" is against the terms of service.
